event.title: opened under the name Big Rock on March 24, 1882

data.event: The Atlanta post office opened under the name Big Rock on March 24, 1882; the name was changed to Atlanta on October 2, 1882.

event.title: was changed to Atlanta on October 2, 1882

data.event: The Atlanta post office opened under the name Big Rock on March 24, 1882; the name was changed to Atlanta on October 2, 1882.
Atlanta was established in 1881 by Alfred J. West.
